citations.narrative:
There were 7 young dogs and 3 older adult dogs that were not officially identified by means of a tag, tattoo, or microchip.
Failure to officially identify all dogs on premises makes it difficult to keep track of animals. Licensee must ensure that all
dogs over 16 weeks of age are officially identified with a tag, tattoo, or microchip. Correct by March 16, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(1) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
There were 7 young dogs and 3 older adult dogs that were not officially identified by means of a tag, tattoo, or microchip. 
Failure to officially identify all dogs on premises makes it difficult to keep track of animals. Licensee must ensure that all 
dogs over 16 weeks of age are officially identified with a tag, tattoo, or microchip. Correct by March 16, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
